column1: 0.0 They were awesome and I wanted one so badly, but my parents could not afford it. I felt very bitter towards my friends for a while after.
column2: 1.0 I never had one. I didnt know they were expensive

column1: 0.0 I had my review today at work! It went really well since the doctor has been giving me compliments!
column2: 1.0 That's great! I hope you keep getting good reviews like that.

column1: 0.0 Yeah im very happy to know what comes next, since I will find out how much of a raise I will get from this. I cant wait!
column2: 1.0 That's awesome. How much do you anticpate the raise to be?

column1: 0.0 My girlfriend recently found herself a new hobby in sewing
column2: 1.0 oh thats cool, is she good ?

column1: 0.0 She's super talented. She made a few dresses and cosplay within a month.
column2: 1.0 oh thats cool

column1: 0.0 I put a lot of effort and time into getting into a college program I wanted to be in.
column2: 1.0 oh that sounds like it will be very rewarding!

column1: 0.0 Unfortunately, I had to switch majors; the program was too difficult to stay in and my mental health was deteriorating.
column2: 1.0 a tough situation but at least you were able to realize and adapt!

column1: 0.0 My sister leaves her clothes all over the living room.
column2: 1.0 Oh god. The living room is shared. She should just leave the messiness in her room.

column1: 0.0 I agree completely! I get so irritated and I always tell her to clean up after herself, but she seems so very lackadaisical.
column2: 1.0 How old is she?

column1: 0.0 My girlfriend's cat is sick with Cancer.
column2: 1.0 I'm so sorry to hear that. How old is the cat?

column1: 0.0 Only a couple of years old. It's so upsetting to think that she won't make it for much longer.
column2: 1.0 All you can do is make sure she's not in too much pain as she goes.

column1: 0.0 Last night my date decided to keep checking out the hot girl at the table next to us.
column2: 1.0 I hope you walked out right then and there!

column1: 0.0 I didnt. I kept on with the date. She was very pretty and well dressed. She drove a nice care. I was kind of envious of it.
column2: 1.0 ah that was really disrespectful of her though. That's not someone you'd want to date long term.

column1: 0.0 The new girl at work is doing really well considering she has not experience. I'm shocked!
column2: 1.0 That is good to hear. She should be a big help a lot quicker than normal then.

column1: 0.0 I agree! Everyone including me were quite shocked byt it.
column2: 1.0 That should bode well for her and her future there though, so it was a good surprise!

column1: 0.0 After a year of being single I decided to start dating again.
column2: 1.0 How has it been going?

column1: 0.0 Its very boring since Im usally home by myself alot. NOw that Iim starting to date it wont be so boring.
column2: 1.0 That is good, hopefully you find your soulmate.

column1: 0.0 A tiger decided to act crazy at the zoo yesterday while the ring leader was doing a performance on stage!
column2: 1.0 Oh god. Did anything happen?

column1: 0.0 Everybody was screaming and leaving the place! It was very scary for everyone! I didnt stay to find out.
column2: 1.0 Well, I hope nothing bad happened!

column1: 0.0 I watched Wimbledon for the first time. Those tennis players are so good!
column2: 1.0 I watched it too! My favorite is Federer. Who is yours?

column1: 0.0 I like watching Serena Williams. Do you watch every summer?
column2: 1.0 I have for the past 10 years! It's one of my favorite sports to watch.

column1: 0.0 My yearly review is coming up and I have been doing well this year.
column2: 1.0 That's great. Do you thiink you will get a raise?

column1: 0.0 I really think I will. I dont expect less than that. I have confidence in it.
column2: 1.0 Confidence is super important

column1: 0.0 I agree. I have no doubt it will go well.
column2: 1.0 good luck. even though you don't need it

column1: 0.0 My boyfriend came home from his trip early. I wasn't expecting him home for another two days!
column2: 1.0 That's great! You must be happy!

column1: 0.0 I was! It was very unexpected and exciting. Although, I was hoping to have time to clean the place up before he got home.
column2: 1.0 How come he came home early?

column1: 0.0 I took my neice to volunteer at a homeless shelter this past weekend. She showed alot of compassion and love for the homless and needy.
column2: 1.0 That's really thoughtful of you. Do you typically do things like that?

column1: 0.0 Well I volunteer to help abused and battered kids. I wanted to show her things like this. I know she can be a good loving person.
column2: 1.0 Perhaps I should find the local shelter in my community and do the same. I have never done that before and I feel like I should be giving back to those less fortunate in some capacity.

column1: 0.0 My boyfriend came home from his trip two days early!
column2: 1.0 Yay! Do you guys have free time to spend together now?

column1: 0.0 Yes. I'm very excited since I haven't seen him in two weeks.
column2: 1.0 That sounds great, you should make him dinner to surprise him back!

column1: 0.0 I was so upset today because 2 people decided to block traffic because of an argument.
column2: 1.0 How long did that last for?

column1: 0.0 for a good 45 minutes. At that it was during rush hour. everybody was so mad at them.
column2: 1.0 Why didn't you tell them to move?

column1: 0.0 A few years back I moved to a new state.  Now my childhood best friends and I live in different parts of the country and I don't know anyone really where I am.
column2: 1.0 You must really miss them.

column1: 0.0 I really do.  I mean we're in constant contact over the internet through instant messaging and video calls.  But it's not often that we all can get together and see each other in person.
column2: 1.0 Yea. Seeing each other on a screen definitely can't beat being with each other in person.

column1: 0.0 My boyfriend unexpectedly came home from his trip two days early!
column2: 1.0 did he catch you doing something crazy?

column1: 0.0 No, thankfully I was just eating.
column2: 1.0 Thats good lol

column1: 0.0 My coworkers last day of work was today. Im so upset she is leaving.
column2: 1.0 That's so sad. Do you have any other friends there?

column1: 0.0 Yeah i do, but she was the one I was closest to. Yes I was very sad.
column2: 1.0 I am so sorry for you. Perhaps you can hang with her after your workdays?

column1: 0.0 I cant wait for Friday! I go on vacation to New York!
column2: 1.0 New York is a fun place to visit.

column1: 0.0 I agree. I never been there so Im so happy!
column2: 1.0 You will have a blast.

column1: 0.0 So my hair dressed ruined my hair! Im so mad!
column2: 1.0 Oh no! was it too short for your liking?

column1: 0.0 Actually I had to shave my head off. She used new product that burnt my hair!
column2: 1.0 Yikes! I would ask for a refund for sure

column1: 0.0 So I lost 20 lbs onmy diet and last night I ate a whole large pizza!
column2: 1.0 Wow! Well a cheat day here and there might be okay! Haha

column1: 0.0 I agree. I feel bad for doing so!
column2: 1.0 Right, but I'd say once isn't too bad as long you stay on track.

column1: 0.0 I remember when my friends were helping me move out of our hometown.  We were riding in the moving truck and it came time to drop them off and say goodbye.  We all felt terrible.
column2: 1.0 I would feel terrible too. Where did you move to?

column1: 0.0 I moved to a town about 30-45 minutes away, but at that point we were so used to seeing each other every day of our lives.  It was hard to get used to.
column2: 1.0 I've moved almost half a dozen times in my life before, so I completely understand. Those were rough times.

column1: 0.0 The manager the store was very mean and rude to the employees. I could not beleive it.
column2: 1.0 That sucks, imagine being in an environment like that all day, I would go crazy

column1: 0.0 I agree. It made me sick to my stomach seeing it. I feel bad for them!
column2: 1.0 I guess some people are just really rude, no matter what position you put them in

column1: 0.0 Last night my GPS asked me to make a right down a dark and scary road.
column2: 1.0 It's hard to trust a GPS. I have heard a lot of stories about people being steered the wrong way. Please tell me you didn't do it.

column1: 0.0 I was very nervous and doubting to do it. I actually did and it wasnt that bad
column2: 1.0 I am so glad that it didn't turn out bad for you.

column1: 0.0 I finally told my friend I was into him. He didnt take it too well.
column2: 1.0 what did he do , how did he react ?

column1: 0.0 He rejected me and told me not to every call him again. Im so embarrassed. I should have known better.
column2: 1.0 Well he is the one missing out and  i'm sure your very worthy of attention from some better.

column1: 0.0 Last night my neice placed 5th at her dance performance. She was so upset and so was I
column2: 1.0 Why was she upset? Depending on how many people entered, fifth could be really good.

column1: 0.0 There were 30 girls. We worked very hard and felt she would place top 3 but what an outcome it was to be 5th.
column2: 1.0 That's still really good! She did better than 25 other people.

column1: 0.0 I am very excited to not have any plans this weekend. It's going to be so nice to relax for two whole days.
column2: 1.0 NIce! I bet you cant wait! Do you anticipate to releax or do things to catch up?

column1: 0.0 Just relaxing this weekend.
column2: 1.0 Very nice! I bet its going to be a good happy weekend.

column1: 0.0 My best friend has won those Taco Bell Playstation 4 giveaways twice so far.  I wish I could be that lucky sometimes.
column2: 1.0 Dang, and here I thought I was lucky winning a free soft drink in that contest. Maybe we have to pool our efforts together and try to win us something big?

column1: 0.0 I know, man just got together and buy like 50 boxes and cross our fingers.  And another thing was he got it on his first try both times.
column2: 1.0 Why stop at 50? We ought to get 100! We need to show your friend and evil corporate Taco Bell who is boss and nab us some consoles!

column1: 0.0 My nephew asked me to use my car this weekend for a drivers ed class.
column2: 1.0 Did you let him?

column1: 0.0 We have been practicing together in my car , so I feel I can let him.
column2: 1.0 You are good to allow him to borrow the car.

column1: 0.0 Im planning on going sky diving this weekend!
column2: 1.0 Wow, I really like to do that. I hope you will enjoy it..

column1: 0.0 I dont know. I hate heights, so im very nervous about it
column2: 1.0 Ah ok. If you try once you will be alright next time..

column1: 0.0 My roommate leaves leftovers in the fridge and they get moldy.
column2: 1.0 That sounds revolting! Have you said anything to him about it?

column1: 0.0 No. I'm not very confrontational. And our lease is up in two months anyway so I'm just going to wait it out.
column2: 1.0 That sounds like a good plan. Perhaps you should request a formal resume from any potential roommates for your future abode.

column1: 0.0 I was at the library today and was trying to study, but this lady across the table was smacking her gum very loud.
column2: 1.0 Did you ask her to stop it or did you have to move away from her?

column1: 0.0 well the library is very small so limited seats so I had to sit there and listen to it. I was so frusterated
column2: 1.0 That was very rude of her to do that, some people just have no manners.

column1: 0.0 So this weekend Im going to do a marathon. I have worked very hard to get myself ready for it
column2: 1.0 That's so exciting! Have you run a marathon before?

column1: 0.0 I never have. I think all this time I been practicing will pay off.
column2: 1.0 That's good, I hope you do well! How did you prepare?

column1: 0.0 My boyfriend came home from his trip two days early!
column2: 1.0 What a nice surprise! Did something happen or did he miss you!?

column1: 0.0 His business trip wrapped up a few days earlier than planned.
column2: 1.0 I see.I bet you and him are happy to be able to spend a little time together.

column1: 0.0 I doubt I will get any sleep waiting for tomorrow.
column2: 1.0 I'm sorry to hear. Why is that?

column1: 0.0 I am finally getting to take the kids to Disneyland!
column2: 1.0 Oh, well that is a fine thing indeed! I would be  jumping up and down!

column1: 0.0  I had to go out of town by myself for three weeks. It was hard not being able to talk to anyone I knew.
column2: 1.0 Sounds pretty lonely. Did you meet or make some friends while out of town?

column1: 0.0 No, I was too busy focusing on work while I was there.
column2: 1.0 Ah I see. Staying focused is hard, especially when your lonely.

column1: 0.0 My neice didnt get into nursing school.She worked so hard for this. I feel bad for her.
column2: 1.0 That's horrible! Is she going to try again?

column1: 0.0 Yeah she is. She is going to retake some classes she made a B in. The look on her face after she found out was pricelss.
column2: 1.0 It must have been awful to see that in someone you care about. I'm glad she's not giving up.

column1: 0.0 I cant wait for this weekend! Im leaving for New York!
column2: 1.0 wow , thats great. You must be loving it

column1: 0.0 Yeah I cant wait. I never been, so I cant sleep thinking about it.
column2: 1.0 You must get a good sleep now to enjoy the New york later

column1: 0.0 My coworkers and I got $200 dollars worth of lottery tickets.
column2: 1.0 Nice! Were they scratch offs?

column1: 0.0 For the powerball. We are all crossing our fingers!
column2: 1.0 I will cross mine too! I hope ya'll win it big.

column1: 0.0 Last night while driving home I fell asleep at the wheel.
column2: 1.0 OMG....that had to be so scary.

column1: 0.0 Yes it was. My phone rang and thats what woke me up. Im so lucky to be here today.
column2: 1.0 I am so glad that you are. Now no more driving when your sleepy.

column1: 0.0 My upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. It makes it difficult for me to sleep.
column2: 1.0 That really sucks. Maybe you should try egging their door? Or just break in and pretend you're bigfoot while they're trying to sleep.

column1: 0.0 I'm not trying to get arrested! I think I'll just wait things out until I move in two months.
column2: 1.0 I would go with the bigfoot option. You can get a costume on the cheap on ebay nowadays. I've used that tactic countless times and it has never failed!

column1: 0.0 Im expecting a good bonus to be on this check coming up. I can finally go buy a new car!
column2: 1.0 That is some exciting news. Do you already know what kind of vehicle you want?

column1: 0.0 Yes! Very exciting! Yes I had my eye on one all year. I cant wait
column2: 1.0 Christmas is coming early. You will have to take me for a ride.

column1: 0.0 I studied so hard and prepared for this exam tomorrow. I bet I will make no less than an A
column2: 1.0 I am sure you will. Good luck for you!!

column1: 0.0 Thanks! It will be a breeze.
column2: 1.0 Whats kind of exam is that?

column1: 0.0 I've got a big test coming up and I'm so worried!
column2: 1.0 Don't be. i think you will ace it.

column1: 0.0 I hope so. I usually do better than I expect to, but that still doesn't make it any less scary.
column2: 1.0 exam's are always scary. we just need to take the mind out of it

column1: 0.0 My bank has called me three times a day ever since I applied for a mortgage. It's been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
column2: 1.0 Why not block the calls?

column1: 0.0 I want them to be able to get in touch with me if something important comes up.
column2: 1.0 Have you asked them to stop calling about this topic?

column1: 0.0 My upstairs neighbors make a ton of noise at all hours of the night. It makes it difficult for me to sleep.
column2: 1.0 Have you spoken to him?

column1: 0.0 No, I don't like to be confrontational. I'm moving in two months anyway, so I'm just going to wait it out.
column2: 1.0 Maybe you should buy some earplugs.

column1: 0.0 I watched Wimbledon on TV over the summer for the first time. Those tennis players are so good!
column2: 1.0 I love tennis. Will you watch the US Open?

column1: 0.0 Maybe. I hadn't considered it yet.
column2: 1.0 It is a great tournament, you should watch.

column1: 0.0 My bank has called me three times a day ever since I applied for a mortgage. It's been a week and they show no signs of slowing down.
column2: 1.0 So are they telling you good news?

column1: 0.0 Not yet. I just filled out the prequalification online. I haven't officially applied yet.
column2: 1.0 Oh okay. Well hopefully they give you a chance to breathe and decide what you want to do.

column1: 0.0 My mom said she was going to make me a mystery dinner. I believe in her!
column2: 1.0 Ooh how nice! Do you have any guesses as to what she may be making you?

column1: 0.0 Nope! She was going to make something completely different from what she usually makes!
column2: 1.0 Well I hope it's good! Your mom sounds like a great person to have a fun surprise for you like that.

column1: 0.0 I met my wife online 7 years ago and can't see myself with anyone else, ever.
column2: 1.0 You are so lucky to find someone special online. That can turn out so badly sometimes for some people.

column1: 0.0 Oh I know. I got lucky, we found out we lived really close to each other so we met up and it has been great ever since.
column2: 1.0 That sounds like fate? Being that both of you lived close to each other.

column1: 0.0 My daughter has worked very hard to keep her school work finished, her room clean, and the dishes washed. I bought her a cell phone for her birthday this year. She is becoming a responsible young preteen
column2: 1.0 Wow, watching kids grow up is hard. How has she been with the cell phone?

column1: 0.0 She has been good so far. We are trying to limit her access to it to just a few hours per day. She also had to "turn it in" at night before she goes to bed.
column2: 1.0 That's great parenting! You have to trust that your children will make the right choices.

column1: 0.0 Yes, you do! Hopefully she keeps doing the right thing with it
column2: 1.0 I am sure with your guidance she will!

column1: 0.0 I have been having some anxiety lately and made an appointment with a psychiatrist. I kept going back and forth about if I wanted to actually go
column2: 1.0 You should go, Otherwise the condition could get worse.

column1: 0.0 I ended up going. I'm really glad I did. She has been a HUGE help for me.
column2: 1.0 That is great news! fortunately doctors are there to help us and i'm glad they have helped you!

column1: 0.0 I had a septic tank issue and called a guy that I found a business card from and had him come out. He didn't have hardly any equipment with him and sounded like he didn't know what to do.
column2: 1.0 Oh my goodness that sounds so bad! Did they charge you for the visit?

column1: 0.0 No. I just asked what it would cost to fix then told him I couldn't afford it to get him to leave.
column2: 1.0 You made the right move. They at least have to show up with that giant truck that sucks the tank dry.

column1: 0.0 I bought a big bag of M&Ms and I could not resist it
column2: 1.0 If I had a bag of M&M's right now I would eat them for sure!

column1: 0.0 well that is what I just did, so far I have eaten half of it
column2: 1.0 maybe save the other half for later. lol.

column1: 0.0 I do not think I can and feel ashamed that I cannot resist it
column2: 1.0 That's ok, it happens to us all. Tomorrow is a new day.

column1: 0.0 I told my girlfriend about my self harm habits a little while ago.
column2: 1.0 How did she reacted to the admission to self harm?

column1: 0.0 She was really sad, but she appreciated the fact that I told her.
column2: 1.0 Now that your girlfriend knows the problem, the both of you can work on solutions and support together.

column1: 0.0 My friends wanted to bring me to laser quest for my birthday.
column2: 1.0 Is that like a laser tag place? That sounds like a lot of fun! What do you think?

column1: 0.0 Yeah exactly. I wasn't sure if I'd like it or not and I was a little unwilling to try it out.
column2: 1.0 I've played laser tag a few times. I think you will have a great time! It's very high paced and noisy but that's half the fun.

column1: 0.0 I spent all of summer doing everything but studying for my final exam
column2: 1.0 Oh that sounds worrisome, do you think you will pass?

column1: 0.0 I'm fairly certain I'm going to fail and I feel awful about myself, but I just can't get myself to do it.
column2: 1.0 I'm sad to hear that but human nature is hard to fight. Honestly, if you have any alternative options or plans you may have to fall back on them.

column1: 0.0 My friends and I had spent all day troubleshooting a new PC build that we had just completed.
column2: 1.0 That sounds intensive! How did it go?

column1: 0.0 It went awful. It turned out that the motherboard or processor were defective and we had to deconstruct it to return both pieces. So much wasted time!
column2: 1.0 I bet that was so defeating! I'm sorry to hear that. I wish there was better quality control with some of these companies that deal in parts.

column1: 0.0 It really was. At least my friend learned a lot about computers as we built it together!
column2: 1.0 That's a good bright side to look at.

column1: 0.0 I found an injured spider with a leg missing in my bathroom a few days ago.
column2: 1.0 Did you save it or kill it?

column1: 0.0 I saved it. I brought it outside and hoped for the best.
column2: 1.0 It's missing a leg so its probably dead unfortunately.

column1: 0.0 I passed two trials that a company put me through and I only have three left.
column2: 1.0 ooh, I bet you can't wait to finish!

column1: 0.0 You got that right! I'm feeling pretty happy about my performance and I think I'll get the job!
column2: 1.0 I hope you get it! Good luck!

column1: 0.0 I spent hours studying for a final exam.
column2: 1.0 How did they go? Did you pass?

column1: 0.0 It went amazing! I expected to pass but I didn't think I'd get a 91!
column2: 1.0 Wow! congrats, you should totally be proud of yourself.

column1: 0.0 I found an old stamp booklet my girlfriend and I filled out before we started dating.
column2: 1.0 That's very sweet! I bet it brought up a lot of feelings inside you.

column1: 0.0  Definitely. I felt so warm and fuzzy on the inside, and so did she when I sent her a snapchat of it.
column2: 1.0 You guys sound like you have a solid relationship. It's always great to find those little pieces from the early days.

column1: 0.0 I'm pretty sure a girl at the convention was hitting on me.
column2: 1.0 Did you get her number?

column1: 0.0 Nah. I have a loving girlfriend and I would never cheat on her.
column2: 1.0 Good man, I have a lot of respect for that.

column1: 0.0 For my camping trip, I brought with me my tent, camping chairs, mattress, sleeping bag, pillows, med-kit, bug spray, food and beer.
column2: 1.0 That sounds like quite the checklist. I'm glad you brought the beer you might need it haha!

column1: 0.0 Oh yeah definitely. Never have I ever felt so ready for anything in my life.
column2: 1.0 Well I bet you're going to have a great time. With that haul I don't see how you couldn't!

column1: 0.0 I saw a man slap his dog on the sidewalk a few times while I was on the bus.
column2: 1.0 Holy cow! Did you call him in?

column1: 0.0 I should have, but last time my girlfriend did that the police ignored it. I was so angry.
column2: 1.0 Oh man!  Do you have a dog?

column1: 0.0 I just had to replace one of the window panes in my house.
column2: 1.0 How come? And was it a pain to replace it?

column1: 0.0 I'm not sure what happened.  I had to have a guy come out to replace it, and couldn't meet him, so my wife had to.
column2: 1.0 I hope he did a good job!

column1: 0.0 My said he did!  I had quite a bit of confidence in him, based on others' feedback.
column2: 1.0 Awesome, I'm glad to hear that. Sometimes it's hard to find contractors with good reputation.

column1: 0.0 When I was a kid, all my friends had Yu-Gi-Oh cards but me.
column2: 1.0 How come you didn't collect them? i loved them myself.

column1: 0.0 I think my parents found them expensive, otherwise I can't think of any other good reason. To be honest, I kind of envied my friends.
column2: 1.0 Well, they are expensive and you didn't really miss much.

column1: 0.0 I took up running and I started seeing a huge improvement in my cardiovascular endurance.
column2: 1.0 Nice, Was it hard to start?

column1: 0.0 Unimaginably hard. But once I got into it I couldn't stop. I'm feeling pretty certain that I'll hit my 5km goal in no time.
column2: 1.0 Wish i could run close to 5km, i'd struggle with 100 meters.

column1: 0.0 My younger brother was playing an old Gamecube game that I loved to play back when I was a kid.
column2: 1.0 That's cool. Man, those tiny disks were easy to lose. what game?

column1: 0.0 He was playing Paper Mario and the Thousand Year Door. What an awesome game! It brought back so many great memories.
column2: 1.0 That's awesome. I get nostalgic about old games as well.

column1: 0.0 My buddy drank way too much at a party and puked all over my favorite jacket.
column2: 1.0 That sounds horrible, Did you wash it or throw it away?

column1: 0.0 I washed it and it came out surprisingly. But at that time, I felt so sick seeing what was happening to my jacket that I thought I was going to puke next.
column2: 1.0 That is a really rough story, You should make him pay for another one.

column1: 0.0 A few months ago, a good friend of mine that I look up to attempted suicide.
column2: 1.0 damn, is he ok now?

column1: 0.0 Thankfully he is. He's doing much better, but the thought still shakes me scared to this day.
column2: 1.0 Did he go to the doctors for help? anyway i'm glad he is OK.

column1: 0.0 I drank too much and passed out a few months ago.
column2: 1.0 Oh no! Was it a fun night?

column1: 0.0 It was, but it got scary at some point. Apparently people were trying to wake me up by shaking me and I would not get up.
column2: 1.0 Oh heck! That had to be really scary for them! glad you're okay though!

column1: 0.0 I was packing up my house to move, and found my old yearbooks! It's so weird to look back and see how far everyone I knew in high school has come.
column2: 1.0 Aww, that sounds interesting!  Are you in touch with many people from high school?

column1: 0.0 A couple people. Fewer as the years go by, unfortunately.
column2: 1.0 I get that.  It's weird when I forget the name of someone I knew for years.

column1: 0.0 My brother went on a low-calorie diet and began shaking everyday.
column2: 1.0 Poor thing!  Is he felling better now?  I hope he quit that diet.

column1: 0.0 He quit the diet a while ago as recommended by his doctor. I was a little scared but I knew it was just side effects of a bad diet.
column2: 1.0 Thank god he is ok.  There are very dangerous diets around, better be guided by his doctor.

column1: 0.0 I let my brother drive my car for the first time yesterday.
column2: 1.0 Were you nervous?

column1: 0.0 No, he's such a good driver. I knew I had nothing to worry about.
column2: 1.0 That's awesome.  I'm glad he did so well.

column1: 0.0 Last week I woke up to a really cute text from my girlfriend and a funny message from my brother.
column2: 1.0 That's lovely! I love waking up to awesome texts.

column1: 0.0 that is the problem, he does nothing, except give me his little mustache smile, one of these days i'll wipe that smile off his face
column2: 1.0 If it were me, I'd call the animal shelter and report possible abuse since the dog does nothing but bark all day - poor thing just needs attention and the owner isn't taking care of it.

column1: 0.0 I feel so sad to see the world in the state that it is in but I am confident that times are changing and humanity is actually good.
column2: 1.0 Really depends on the person I think. You can't have good people without bad people.

column1: 0.0 Yes that is true. The ying and the yang. But I think most people are good though.
column2: 1.0 Agreed!

column1: 0.0 My childhood was great. I have mainly positive memories of it.
column2: 1.0 You are very lucky my friend. There are so many children out there that cannot say the same, sadly. But so happy for you!

column1: 0.0 Yeah life ends up pretty dark for tons of people. It's slightly absurd when you think far into it!
column2: 1.0 I guess it all comes down to karma, if you believe in that stuff...... I do. :)

column1: 0.0 I decided to try and get some projects knocked out a couple of nights ago, but needed to keep my kids occupied.
column2: 1.0 what did you end up doing?

column1: 0.0 Luckily, my wife was willing to keep them busy.  Even after she had a crazy day!
column2: 1.0 It's good to have a partner.

column1: 0.0 My wife took the kids over to her mother's one evening before I got home from work.  I thought it'd be pretty nice to have a quiet house for once.
column2: 1.0 I have a son, it's definitely nice to have some peace and quiet.

column1: 0.0 It was for a while, but it was too quiet for me!  I've gotten used to the noise.
column2: 1.0 You must have been very happy when they returned home.

column1: 0.0 I tried for a promotion at work recently.  It's been a while since I've gotten a raise, so I worked pretty hard at it.
column2: 1.0 Did you get it?

column1: 0.0 No, they ended up giving it to someone with less experience.
column2: 1.0 That's disappointing. I feel sorry for you.

column1: 0.0 I went to the casino with my brother and the only thing he could do was win! The only thing I could do was lose.
column2: 1.0 That sounds like a bummer. Hopefully, you did not lose too much.

column1: 0.0 Nope, I'm a little careful when I go out there.  It would have been nice to join in on the winning though!
column2: 1.0 Yeah, but it is a good thing to hear you did not lose too much. Some people put all the money on the line.

column1: 0.0 I interviewed for a job.  I know I gave great answers to their questions and walked away feeling like the job was mine.
column2: 1.0 Hey, that's awesome! I hope you get it. When do you hear?

column1: 0.0 Probably next week sometime. I'm really excited!
column2: 1.0 Well I hope you do. What kind of job is it?

column1: 0.0 I work in tech support.  One issue I was given the details before and got to do research before I worked with the customer.  It was great knowing what to do before it happened.
column2: 1.0 You must have been relieved you were able to help. Did all go as plan?

column1: 0.0 yeah! I pretty much knew all the steps that I needed to do before everything started and there werent any surprise issues which was awesome.
column2: 1.0 That's awesome! I'm glad it went through without a hitch!

column1: 0.0 my girlfriend just got promoted at her job. I am really glad for her.
column2: 1.0 Oh, that's terrific! What a great feeling that is, to be appreciated and valued!

column1: 0.0 i knew she could and would get the promotion, i feel like i am going to burst
column2: 1.0 Oh, I love that you are so happy for her! You sound like such a supportive and loving partner!

column1: 0.0 I have been working on potty training my dog and she has been doing great! Last night though she went a TON in the house right after I brought her out.
column2: 1.0 I also have two older puppies, training takes time and care and love.

column1: 0.0 It definitely does!  I have one older puppy that I got through potty training.  This one is just taking a little extra time.
column2: 1.0 Puppies are smart believe it or not, use treats and don't yell or punish for their mistakes. A change of tone and placing them outside works really well.

column1: 0.0 I was packing up things to move from my girlfriends house and found her son's lite brite.  It reminded me of my childhood and playing with that toy.
column2: 1.0 i remember the lite brite toy. it was a nice toy to have.

column1: 0.0 It really was! The toys back then seemed to have lasted a lot longer than the toys now too!
column2: 1.0 i agree, the toys now days are made cheaply and of poor quality. everything is about video games.

column1: 0.0 I had a move a couple weekends ago.  I was really planning on getting everything done, or at least moved over, in one weekend.
column2: 1.0 Moving can be stressful for sure, hopefully you had some help?

column1: 0.0 yeah, the help was great and we did end up getting everything over.  Now the fun part is unpacking the boxes!
column2: 1.0 It's like christmas! only you already know whats in the boxes. the best part about moving is you can have a fresh start on organization.

column1: 0.0 I had a great weekend with my son, we did a ton of fun things.  At the end of the weekend his attitude changed and he didnt want to listen at all.
column2: 1.0 That's not good!  What did you do to try to get him to listen again?

column1: 0.0 I made a deal that if he went to bed he would get tablet time the next day and if he didnt then he wouldnt get any time
column2: 1.0 I bet that worked!

column1: 0.0 My dog went number 2 in the middle of the night inside.  The next morning she threw up everything...it was the worst smelling pile of stuff I've ever smelled.
column2: 1.0 Oh man, i'm about to eat dinner over here! lol that's pretty gross. My cat pukes up stuff all the time so i can kind of relate.

column1: 0.0 Sorry about that! Yeah, it was a terrible thing to wake up to!
column2: 1.0 I bet, hope the dog is feeling better though.

column1: 0.0 I used to have a boxer puppy that was so sweet and adorable.  HOwever he had on issue that I could not stand.
column2: 1.0 interesting, what was the issue?

column1: 0.0 Well when he was during the potty training stage he would often poop on the floor.   HOwever he would then eat it!!!!!   I could smell it but not find it anywhere.   He would come running into the living room wanting to lick you on the face with poop breath!
column2: 1.0 oh man, that is an issue, i hope he grows out of it

column1: 0.0 next week my vacation starts. I am really looking forward to it
column2: 1.0 I bet you cant wait.  WHere are going for your vacation?

column1: 0.0 i always wanted to visit Miami, i can't wait to visit the beach and take in all  the fun
column2: 1.0 Miami sounds like a great place to go for a vacation.   I wish I was going with you!

column1: 0.0 One of my coworkers was outright belligerent today.
column2: 1.0 That sucks! What were they upset about?

column1: 0.0 I don't even know!  She does that sometimes, and just badgers you.  I can't figure out what fires her up.
column2: 1.0 It sounds like a very challenging environment to work in.

column1: 0.0 My girlfriend is moving in.  I was pretty calm when we first started talking about it.  I'm really excited but there is so much to pack up!
column2: 1.0 That's exciting! When will she be moving in?

column1: 0.0 In 2 weeks.  It'll come up fast, I think thats why I'm starting to get a little more nervous.  Its not even her, its just the move that will not be fun
column2: 1.0 Does she live far away?

column2: 1.0 That sounds very frustrating.

column1: 0.0 It is!  The guy at the city could care less if he helps us out.
column2: 1.0 Hopefully you'll able to get it all sorted out soon.  I'm sure when it's done it'll be a beautiful house.

column1: 0.0 I was home alone last night playing a VR game.  It took a really creepy turn that I really wasnt expecting at all.
column2: 1.0 What happened?

column1: 0.0 It was a duck hunting game and all of a sudden the dog from the game killed my mom and started coming after me.  I dont know if you've ever tried VR but everything feels SO real.  It was pretty scary
column2: 1.0 I've never tried VR, but just imagining that is scaring me away from it.

column1: 0.0 a job I applied and interview for a couple of months ago offered me the job. It was unexpected.
column2: 1.0 Congrats!  How exciting for you.

column1: 0.0 thank you, when they called, I did not know who it was at first, then it was, wow I got the job
column2: 1.0 That's a long time to hold out hope.  I bet you were shocked.

column1: 0.0 My husband, I think you've met him, he's been having a hard time finding a job recently. He's been in the final two candidates THREE times but no luck!
column2: 1.0 It always takes time. Hang in there It will all work out.

column1: 0.0 Well, he's got another interview on Thursday. I just know he will get that one!
column2: 1.0 I bet so too!  Good luck to you both.

column1: 0.0 i needed help with choosing a subject to major and my brother helped
column2: 1.0 What subject did you choose?

column1: 0.0 I chose finance and economics
column2: 1.0 Nice choice. I guess you have good relationship with your brother.

column1: 0.0 I felt ashamed seeing the police officer yelling at the old lady
column2: 1.0 why was the officer yelling at her?

column1: 0.0 She was trying to cross the road and accidentally had her phone fall, the officer thought she was insane
column2: 1.0 wow, that's unfortunate. i would feel embarrassed for the lady

column1: 0.0 My mother has been a caring mom since i got ill a week ago
column2: 1.0 That's so wonderful. I love being cared for when I am ill.

column1: 0.0 Yah, i feel loved so much
column2: 1.0 It is an amazing thing to have a loving mother. Everyone should show more appreciation to their moms.

column1: 0.0 I had to walk home from work last night after I got off late at night, it was kind of scary.
column2: 1.0 Sorry about that, you could have taken a taxi

column1: 0.0 It was a short enough walk, I just stayed aware of my surroundings and got home safe.
column2: 1.0 good enough you got home safe

column1: 0.0 Today I was looking through my childhood photos and writings, it made me a little emotional and nostalgic.
column2: 1.0 Did you have a good childhood? You must miss a lot of things.

column1: 0.0 I think I had a good childhood. I love that I have many photos that I ca look back on.
column2: 1.0 Yes. Nostalgia is unavoidable when we look back on our youth.

column1: 0.0 I slept through a really important class because I was hungover and I failed because of it. I should've behaved better.
column2: 1.0 That's unfortunate. But at least you learned from the experience, right?

column1: 0.0 I sure did. I am just embarrassed that I did that, I am not usually that way. It was out of character for me.
column2: 1.0 No need to feel ashamed. We all make mistakes and at least you learned your lesson.

column1: 0.0 I had to care for my younger brother last week while he was sick. I tried my best to make him as comfortable as possible.
column2: 1.0 That's nice that you helped him. I'm sure he appreciated it!

column1: 0.0 He did, he is nice and well now. I just know how horrible it is to be sick, it helps to have someone to care for you.
column2: 1.0 Yes, it really does. I am sure if you get sick, he will remember and do the same for you!

column1: 0.0 I once got in a really bad accident on my way home from work and it really upset me
column2: 1.0 Wow! Were you hurt? Was anyone else hurt?

column1: 0.0 luckily the only problem I had was my neck was sore for a few weeks but nobody else was hurt
column2: 1.0 That's good news at least. I hope you are feeling better now. And don't be hard on yourself, accidents happen.

column1: 0.0 Hi! I had a great day with my emotions with my child going to school!
column2: 1.0 Oh that's great, its awesome when the kids go off to school each year.

column1: 0.0 Yes - this is m child's first year and it was pretty difficult for me to let someone take care of him instead of me. You know how it is! Parent life.
column2: 1.0 You'll get used to it and begin to appreciate your quiet time, haha.

column1: 0.0 I just had a weird experience at Wal-Mart today!
column2: 1.0 Wal-Mart is a place where weirdness always happens. Can you tell me what happened, I'm dying to know!

column1: 0.0 Well, I was parked pretty close and a guy came up to ask me for gas money!  There was a gas station a small walk away though!
column2: 1.0 Do you think he was panhandling you for money or a person who really needed it? Did you give him money?

column1: 0.0 I'm going to cut to the chase here. Just blurt it on. My DRESS blew up in front of parents and children the other day when it was windy.
column2: 1.0 That must have been a very windy day!

column1: 0.0 I wanted to run and hide.  I haven't' worn a dress since.
column2: 1.0 I bet It will teach you.

column1: 0.0 i felt great last year when i started going to church again
column2: 1.0 I go to church every Sunday I love it.

column1: 0.0 yeah its a great feeling getting back into church !
column2: 1.0 The people you can meet are super.

column1: 0.0 I felt very grateful last week when an elderly women paid for my gas
column2: 1.0 That

column1: 0.0 Yeah its nice when people do kind things like this it doesn't happen very often now day
column2: 1.0 That is really not thing. I wish more people would do such nice thing. I know that made your day.

column1: 0.0 When I lived on my own, I found it hard without having any company
column2: 1.0 So you don't like to be alone. I am so sorry that affects you. So what would you do?

column1: 0.0 I was used to having family or friends around most of the time in my old place, but then I moved away. I had to make new friends which I found very difficult
column2: 1.0 Yes, usually when one relocates it's hard to make new friends, but eventually it will happen.

column1: 0.0 I eventually made friends through work, and it is really nice when my old friends come to visit too
column2: 1.0 That was really nice of your old friends.

column1: 0.0 I love the gifts that i received last week on my birthday
column2: 1.0 Happy birthday. What was your favorite gift?

column1: 0.0 A pair of shoe
column2: 1.0 Nice. What brand of shoes were they?

column1: 0.0 I felt a bit sad last week when i saw an elderly man drop his wallet and a kid picked it up and didn't give it back to the man
column2: 1.0 That's terrible. Were you able to identify the kid?

column1: 0.0 Yeah eventually the kid was caught i told the man and he caught him shortly after
column2: 1.0 I'm glad he was able to catch him.

column1: 0.0 I saw the movie trailer about Paul Walker's life today. It made me so sad!
column2: 1.0 Wow, how was it? I have never seen that trailer.

column1: 0.0 It was just sad. I love Paul Walker and his movies. I still remember hearing about him passing away in the same way he became famous. In a fast car.
column2: 1.0 Aww, that is so sad to hear. He must have made some great movies!

column1: 0.0 Speaking of babies, I got to meet my nephews yesterday!
column2: 1.0 Are they twins?!

column1: 0.0 Yes!  They are so sweet. I don't even like kids and I really felt my heart warm up to them.
column2: 1.0 Awww! Twins seem like a handful but also very exciting at the same time!

column1: 0.0 The other day something happened that made me want to run and hide.
column2: 1.0 Oh, I'm sorry. What happened?

column1: 0.0 It didn't happen to me directly, but my husband passed GAS while we were shopping. Everyone was staring.
column2: 1.0 I can imagine that you did want to run and hide. Sometimes husbands get us into all kinds of situations.

column1: 0.0 My girlfriend and I were watching a series on Netflix.  She wasnt home and I ended up watching a couple episodes ahead of where we were at.
column2: 1.0 I've been in that situation before. Did she find out about it?

column1: 0.0 She didnt say anything but I think she knew.  I mean, I still watched the episodes that she missed with her!
column2: 1.0 Well that's all that matters. If she was okay with it. I'm sure she was happy watching the episodes with you, even if you had already watched them.

column1: 0.0 I moved last weekend.  I was really happy once everything was done and it went smoothly.
column2: 1.0 That sounds like a bit of work. Are you adjusting to your place now?

column1: 0.0 Yeah, unpacking and all that fun stuff now.  I really like the new place though.
column2: 1.0 That's what's most important. I'm glad everything has gone well.

column1: 0.0 I'm not in a good mood! My husband got to go to a basketball game. I wish I could have too!
column2: 1.0 Oh, I'm sorry. Why didn't you get to go with him?

column1: 0.0 I have to stay home with our son.  It is hard for us to find a baby sitter for him.
column2: 1.0 Oh, that's too bad. I know exactly how you feel. Hopefully your husband will watch your son another night so you can go have some fun.

column1: 0.0 I went to a friend's wedding this weekend!
column2: 1.0 Was it a lot of fun?

column1: 0.0 Oh gosh yes. I wore a beautiful dress. I felt so pretty!
column2: 1.0 That's great, but you don't have to wear a fancy dress to be beautiful. I'm sure you're gorgeous no matter what you wear!

column1: 0.0 Thank you! I feel like a slob lately.
column2: 1.0 It's ok, just try your best to remind yourself how beautiful you are and practice self-care as a habit.

column1: 0.0 it is nice to have a loving pet , My dog is always there for me
column2: 1.0 What a great feeling! You must love your dog.

column1: 0.0 i really do, no matter what happens, she will always be by my side
column2: 1.0 She sounds like a great companion.

column1: 0.0 Hello! I started my graduate classes today.
column2: 1.0 Are you looking forward to it?

column1: 0.0 Yes. I have all my binders ready with paper and a calendar to keep track of stuff.  I'm nervous but ready!
column2: 1.0 Exciting! I'm sure you'll do fine.

column1: 0.0 I really need to change doctors!
column2: 1.0 Why is that?

column1: 0.0 He keeps screwing up my prescription!  I've needed it for a week now but they keep sending it to the wrong place or use the wrong name
column2: 1.0 Wow, that's no good. I hope they get it worked out soon.

column1: 0.0 I was playing a VR game home alone.  It took a really creepy turn towards the end of the game.
column2: 1.0 I can't play those kinds of games. Too spooky for me.

column1: 0.0 It didnt start off scary but out of nowhere everyone around me was dying and I was home alone with a killer outside the house.  It all just feels so real in VR too.
column2: 1.0 That would keep me up at night.

column1: 0.0 yesterday i ate a whole big bag of M&Ms, i don't feel proud of myself
column2: 1.0 Oh my gosh that's insane. Well, I'm sure you'll be able to control your impulses in the future.

column1: 0.0 i hope so, i was doing so well on my diet but I feel like I failed
column2: 1.0 I've been there before too. The important thing to remember is that there is always another chance to make it right tomorrow.

column1: 0.0 We recently got a new puppy. My older dog waits his turn and knows the puppy should go outside to the bathroom first.
column2: 1.0 Aww, sounds like he is teaching the puppy. That's so sweet.

column1: 0.0 It is pretty awesome!  I'm impressed that he knows he doesnt need to be first and the puppy should have priority.
column2: 1.0 Yeah, sounds like a pretty smart pup.

column1: 0.0 We've been really struggling with potty training my son.
column2: 1.0 I do understand, I have a son myself. You just need to be patient and continue trying.

column1: 0.0 Thanks, we are.  He did finally go #2 in the toilet by himself last night, though!
column2: 1.0 That is awesome. I am proud of him

column1: 0.0 I went out with some friends a couple weekends ago and we met a group of girls. One asked for my number but I told her I have a girlfriend and didnt give it out.
column2: 1.0 gotta risk it for the biscuit

column1: 0.0 Haha, I dont think I could do that to my girlfriend.  I like her too much for a random chick.
column2: 1.0  i feel ya but sometimes temptation is good gets the heart pumping

column1: 0.0 i have a presentation due this week, I am not looking forward to presenting it in front of others
column2: 1.0 It can be nerve wrecking. I'm sure you will do fine, though! Have confidence!

column1: 0.0 i feel like i know the material but i am not sure if i can pull it off in front of others
column2: 1.0 You know they say, imagine them in their underwear...I wonder that really works. I'm not fond of public speaking either.

column1: 0.0 I felt very bad when my boss did not approve of my work. It just makes me more motivated to work harder.
column2: 1.0 Did you spend a lot of the time on the project?

column1: 0.0 Yes, I feel like I worked really hard and I put in so many hours. I guess it was not good enough. :(
column2: 1.0 I wouldnt get discouraged.  Maybe talk to your boss and see what you can improve on next time.  I'm sure, at least if you have a good boss, they will want you to succeed and guide you in how to do better.

column1: 0.0 My roommate moved out and soon my girlfriend will move in but right now it is just me in the house. I dont remember the last time I lived without any roommates.
column2: 1.0 Nice! Enjoy it! I like living alone. It is so peaceful! I get lonely somtimes but for the most part it is great!

column1: 0.0 It does feel a little lonely.  It's weird coming home and not really having someone to talk to in person.
column2: 1.0 Yeah, but they are all just a phone call away. Keep your head up, your girlfriend will be there soon!

column1: 0.0 I feel so happy when the sunsets are beautiful and I can take the time to watch and relax. It is the best time of the day for me.
column2: 1.0 Oh I know, mine too! I love how all the colors change with the setting sun.

column1: 0.0 Yeah, it is such a good time to reflect and meditate on life and stop to enjoy the beauty of this world.
column2: 1.0 It reminds you of how beautiful life is.

column1: 0.0 Man the new guys at work were slandering our boss so bad.
column2: 1.0 Wow, that's rude! He won't last long...

column1: 0.0 I know right?  I made sure to keep my mouth shut and not add on to what they were saying or doing.
column2: 1.0 Yeah, some nerve on that guy. He should be grateful to have a job!

column1: 0.0 My sister is having another baby! I can't wait to meet her! This will be her fourth child.
column2: 1.0 Oh wow! Congrats!! How exciting!! How far along is she?

column1: 0.0 Only one more month to go. She is about the explode though! Glad it is her and not me, lol.
column2: 1.0 LOL Right!!! It's way too hot to be pregnant right now!

column1: 0.0 Totally agree! But I will be there to fan my sister for her at least. Haha
column2: 1.0 You are so awesome!!! I wish I had  sister like you when I was pregnant.

column1: 0.0 There was a random dog in my yard yesterday morning.  He didn't look mean but I wasn't sure I wanted to mess with him.
column2: 1.0 I've been in that situation before!  It can be scary

column1: 0.0 It was!  I didn't want to chase him off either.  Thankfully he just kind of wandered away.
column2: 1.0 I'm glad it worked out in the end!  I wish people would be more careful with their dogs.

column1: 0.0 I bought something from the store and the lady gave me the wrong change. She gave me too much change actually. I did not realize until later after I left the store.
column2: 1.0 Oh, no. Did you take it back or keep it

column1: 0.0 I have not had time to go back yet but I will for sure. I feel bad like as if I did something wrong. I better check my change from now on.
column2: 1.0 The store might not take it back at this point if it has been to long.

column1: 0.0 So I was driving down the road the other day and passed that stretch of road that has all those mimosa trees.  They were in bloom and man did they stir up some emotions.
column2: 1.0 That sounds beautiful! What emotions did they bring out of you?

column1: 0.0 My grandmother kept those trees at our old house.  They super made me miss her and when we used to sit outside on her porch.
column2: 1.0 I'm sorry! What a lovely memory to have of her though. It's good to still have things in your life that remind you of her.

column1: 0.0 So I lost the ring that my best friend gave me when he moved out of country.  We had matching ones made and it's really breaking my heart.
column2: 1.0 Oh no! That's so sad. I'm so sorry, I know you must feel like crap.

column1: 0.0 It's strange sometimes how we get so attached to material things like this.  I know I really shouldn't but it feels like a piece of me is gone.
column2: 1.0 I understand completely. I have things of my grandfather's that I can never replace.

column1: 0.0 We had a pretty fun family vacation about a month ago.
column2: 1.0 Sweet! Where did you go?

column1: 0.0 We went to a lake not far from here.  We had a ton of fun on the boat . . . nobody else was on the water one of the days!
column2: 1.0 That would be awesome to have the whole lake to yourself! My guess is the weather was nice too if you guys got to use the boat most days!

column1: 0.0 I work in tech support.  Every once in a while a customer will want our software to do something it either cant or is not built for.
column2: 1.0 I've had similar experiences.  What do you end up doing?

column1: 0.0 I write up feedback for development. It just gets frustrating when they start to demand that I fix it.  I might be good at my job but not good enough to do a code change on the fly.
column2: 1.0 Have you ever had a positive experience from that cycle?

column1: 0.0 I had to take my dog to the vet yesterday and I had full confidence they would take care of his problems. They are so good there.
column2: 1.0 oh no! hope all is well with your dog.

column1: 0.0 Thank you. Other than an allergic reaction and a subsequent skin infection all is well. Just a couple weeks of meds and a change in diet needed.
column2: 1.0 Good to read. Always great to find a vet you can trust. Looks like you did.

column1: 0.0 So we went out to that new BBQ place to eat the other night.

column1: 0.0 It wasn't bad.  It wasn't earth shattering good either.  Everything just weirdly seemed okay.  It was a bit strange.

column1: 0.0 I really loathe meetings.  They're usually so pointless.
column2: 1.0 i completely agree. though, i'm remote so i am never sitting in the same room as others so i can distract myself ;)

column1: 0.0 That must be nice . . . I'm in person.  However, I actually had a productive meeting this morning.  How novel that was!
column2: 1.0 lol. it kinda is. i moved about 3 hours south of my office a few years ago and since even at the office my work involves connecting to remote data centers it hasn't changed my job any.

column1: 0.0 Oh man.  I was at the store yesterday and my nose just started bleeding like crazy!

column1: 0.0 I had to bolt out of the store!  I have never been so embarrassed.  Lucky for me I had a napkin in my purse so I didn't get it everywhere.

column1: 0.0 I was! I thought I was going to get in trouble

column1: 0.0 the other day I was looking at old pictures of a car i use to own. I miss that car.

I was embarrassed, but it made me feel better to find out that it seems like it's a common thing that happens, since they're female authority figures that you can easily mix up.

The best thing to do there is to just show off your sense of humor and ability to make fun of yourself and not take yourself too seriously, which it sounds like maybe you did.

column2: 1.0 Yes, where do you live?

column2: 1.0 I love Colorado. I visit all the time.

column1: 0.0 Sometimes I feel very happy that I am a US resident. When I travel to other countries everyone is so amazed that I am from the US. They treat you very differently because they think that the US is so great, rich and free.
column2: 1.0 Yeah, we have a lot to be thankful for.  We take for granted many of the perks of being a US resident!

column1: 0.0 Well, physically not so much, just a light scrape on my knee. But man my pride got wounded bad!
column2: 1.0 I bet that was a little embarrassing.

column1: 0.0 I was a cigarette smoker for nearly an entire decade. In retrospect this is slightly embarrassing.
column2: 1.0 Don't be embarrassed. You know that you had a problem and you are better now for it

column1: 0.0 Right. Not much that can be done about it now. I enjoy having more money now though for sure!
column2: 1.0 That's understandable. I wish you the best in staying smoke free!

column1: 0.0 Being a parent so far has not been anywhere near as difficult as I expected it to be. My daughter is awesome!
column2: 1.0 That is great to hear that things are going well for you.

column1: 0.0 Thanks that means a lot to me!
column2: 1.0 I am sure that things will continue to go smooth since you have a positive attitude about it.

column1: 0.0 I was waiting to hear back about a potential job offer, I really wanted the job.
column2: 1.0 How long has it been since the interview?

column1: 0.0 That's the thing, my anxiety and excitement started the moment I first talked to the company, it was driving me crazy. But I ended up getting the job!
column2: 1.0 Oh well congrats and good job!

column1: 0.0 My friend just won $500 in scratch-off lottery tickets!
column2: 1.0 Oh that is awesome for your friend!

column1: 0.0 Oh totally. I'm happy for her but part of me was also a little envious, I hate to admit.
column2: 1.0 Yeah I can understand that. I would feel the same.

column1: 0.0 I took on a challenging speed bike course recently that was above my skill level.
column2: 1.0 That was probably not a good idea, how did it go for you?

column1: 0.0 It actually worked out amazing! I knew going into it that I'd practiced a lot and had built up my skills, so I was sure I could do it even if I was a little hesitant.
column2: 1.0 Well, you never know if you can do something till you try. I am glad you were able to do so well.

column1: 0.0 When I was interviewing for a promotion at my job. I did all I could to get ready for the interview.
column2: 1.0 That can be kind of scary. How did it go?

column1: 0.0 It went great. I having put in all the work ahead of time to get ready, I knew exactly how to answer the questions they had for me.
column2: 1.0 Awesome, congratulations! It just goes to show how great things can happen when you're prepared.

column1: 0.0 At my job a coworker took credit for a job I had completed. Once I found out, I went straight to my boss and got it straightened out.
column2: 1.0 Good job.  Your coworker sounds like a shady little b**ch did you let him/her know what's up

column1: 0.0 I found them and gave them a piece of my mind. What kind of person does something like that.
column2: 1.0 For real.  Glad you had enough self-respect to handle it, most people dont'

column1: 0.0 We went camping this summer and my boyfriend made fun of me for packing so much stuff.
column2: 1.0 Aww haha how many bags did you bring

column1: 0.0 It honestly wasn't *that* much stuff, I packed it well. But the joke's on him, he felt dumb for making fun of me after we needed a bottle opener and I just so happened to pack one.
column2: 1.0 Heey there you go...sounds like you're the resourceful one

column1: 0.0 This couple just moved into my building and have been having loud parties almost every night!
column2: 1.0 That sounds awful!

column1: 0.0 Yeah, it's really irritating. I don't mind people having fun but come on, every single night? It's really ticking me off.
column2: 1.0 Have you tried talking to them about it?

column1: 0.0 An actual ice cream man came through my neighborhood! I didn't think they still exist.
column2: 1.0 I don't think that I have seen/heard one of those since the 90s... Possibly the early 2000's at the earliest! Crazy, I didn't know that they still exist either!

column1: 0.0 Right? Seeing the kids come running out really made me miss when I was little and got all excited about the ice cream man!
column2: 1.0 I loved that too!

column1: 0.0 I am content with my life. I have nothing to complain about, luckily!
column2: 1.0 That is wonderful to hear, good for you. There's way too much craziness in the world making people unhappy. It's nice to hear someone is doing well and happy.

column1: 0.0 Agreed. I have to actively distance myself away from the drama of reality but doing this makes me happier. Not sure if this is ideal but that's ok!
column2: 1.0 Distancing yourself from the negative things sounds like a totally healthy way to insulate yourself from that stuff.

column1: 0.0 I was cleaning out the attic last week, and came across a box of old photo albums and some of my childhood things. I sat for hours just looking at old photos.
column2: 1.0 Aw, that must have brought up a lot of nostalgia for you.

column1: 0.0 It really did. Seeing all those old faces I haven't seen for years. It was a great experience.
column2: 1.0 Did you share it with anyone else?

column1: 0.0 I recently applied for a job with a  new company. It would be such a step up for my family if I got it.
column2: 1.0 Nice, a step up is always such a relief. Do you feel confident you'll get the job?

column1: 0.0 Some, I did well in the interview. Just trying to keep spirits up while they make their decision.
column2: 1.0 Well I hope you get it. Good luck!

column1: 0.0 I'm waiting to hear about a lucrative job opportunity, it would pretty much be my dream job.
column2: 1.0 That's great. How long are you going to have to wait?

column1: 0.0 Not sure, hopefully I hear this upcoming week. I feel pretty good about my chances so that's making the waiting a little easier.
column2: 1.0 I am glad you are so confident about your prospects. I hope you hear something very soon from them.

column1: 0.0 Most of the decisions that I made as a teenager were kind of embarrassing in retrospect.
column2: 1.0 I think we've all been there...I've done my fair share of dumbassery

column1: 0.0 I feel it. Most of the bad decisions were fun, at least.
column2: 1.0 Ha YOLOOO

column1: 0.0 I can't wait until all the trees change colors and the weather starts getting cold. I love Autumn!
column2: 1.0 I know right! I noticed leaves on the ground the other day and got all excited! Is autumn your favorite season, too?

column1: 0.0 Yes! My absolute favorite! It's not too cold and not too hot and there is so much beauty all around! It is soon time to get all the winter clothes out.
column2: 1.0 I don't mind winter either but you're so right, the temperature is just right during fall.

column1: 0.0 I worked really hard on this project for work and it totally bombed.
column2: 1.0 Awe, sorry to hear that. I am sure you did better than you think.

column1: 0.0 Well, not really according to analytics. I was really let down by the fact that it was a flop but I'm not going to let it drag me down too much.
column2: 1.0 That is a good attitude. Better luck next time!

column1: 0.0 The house is all cleaned and ready for my guests. Wow, I was cleaning all day!
column2: 1.0 I was doing the same thing!  Hard work but so satisfying when you see the results!  Who is coming to stay?

column1: 0.0 Yes, there is no better satisfaction, in my opinion, than a clean house. :) My sister is visiting with her kids. They are staying for a week here at my house. I am sure the house is going to be trashed in the end.
column2: 1.0 I completely agree.  Mine can get trashed in 10 minutes flat from the kids.  ha ha. Oh, how fun!  I hope you have a wonderful time!  Yeah, you'll probably be cleaning all over again by the end of it but its worth it.

column1: 0.0 My neighbor sits out on his balcony butt naked sometimes.

column1: 0.0 No but that might be a good idea. It's just an awkward and gross situation.
column2: 1.0 I bet.  I wonder what he is thinking.

column1: 0.0 I feel confident that eating a fruitarian diet will give me more energy and happiness.
column2: 1.0 Hmm, don't you need fat and protein in your diet also?

column1: 0.0 I have done a lot of research and so many fruitarians are thriving and feeling the best they ever had in their life. There is fat in avocados and avocados are considered a fruit..
column2: 1.0 Oh I hadn't even thought of avocado. Well good luck with the diet, I hope it works for you!

column1: 0.0 I wrote an email to a family member I haven't spoken to in a long time and I wasn't sure how they'd take everything I said in it.
column2: 1.0 Oh wow! That is a brave thing to do! Your letter must have been a little intense if you are worried how they will take it. How did it work out?

column1: 0.0 Yep, it was full of emotion and a lot of things I needed to get off my chest. I was quite nervous waiting for a response but it turns out I had nothing to worry about. She was really glad I spoke up!
column2: 1.0 Awe that is great! I am glad there was a happy ending!

column1: 0.0 I get so mad when the local kids throw eggs at the front doors of houses in my neighborhood. It is so infuriating!
column2: 1.0 Oh man I'd be mad too...you should wait outside with a paintball gun

column1: 0.0 Yeah! I wish I had the time for it! I am going to buy one of the web cams and catch them in the act. I am going to teach them a lesson! But I love the paintball idea! That is great!
column2: 1.0 Yup gotta lay down the law

column1: 0.0 I moved into this new house and was woken up with this horrible screeching noise in the middle of the night.
column2: 1.0 Terrifying! What was it?

column1: 0.0 It turned out to be the sump pump, I guess it was old. But yes, it scared the daylights out of me!
column2: 1.0 Oh good. I bet!  I wouldn't have been able to go back to sleep after that!  Do you have to replace the pump?

column1: 0.0 I made a really inappropriate joke about a coworker to some other people I work with and it got back to him.
column2: 1.0 Oops. I hate when that happens. Did they say anything to you?

column1: 0.0 No, but the person who told him confessed. So I decided to be the bigger person and apologize to my coworker before things got too out of hand. He actually wasn't that upset and appreciated that I owned up to it, but I still felt bad for it, mostly that I did it behind his back.
column2: 1.0 That was really nice of you to apologize like that. Some people would have just ignored it. I know that could have been embarrassing.

column1: 0.0 I got my work done early on Friday so I got to spend the day trying out a new bike trail on my new bike!
column2: 1.0 that sounds exciting! Do you bike a lot?

column1: 0.0 I've only recently started getting really into it. It sounds kind of corny but getting out there on my bike makes life just really... satisfying. Calm.

column1: 0.0 I feel like my husband is the sweetest man in the world

column1: 0.0 Not really. She was old and we woke up one day and she could not use her back legs. It was very sad.

column1: 0.0 Thankfully, yes!! It took several months to replace everything that I could -- but even things, so many things I just simply couldn't replace.

column1: 0.0 I am in charge of booking meeting rooms for outside companies at my job. Last week, I made a big mistake and accidentally gave a group a room for free when they should've paid $100.

column1: 0.0 Thankfully, not too much! I was simply mortified because this was one of my main responsibilities and I managed to mess that one up so badly!

column1: 0.0 My brother and his friends invited me to a party tonight.

column1: 0.0 Isn't it nice when people bring you food, when you've had a long day?
column2: 1.0 Oh for sure. I hate having to cook and do dishes after a long hard day

column1: 0.0 Exactly! My boyfriend brought me dinner the other night. I had no groceries and just didn't feel like going out after a long stressful day. I was so thankful.

column1: 0.0 My little sister has been going all across the country this summer, spending lots of time on money on pop concert after pop concert.
column2: 1.0 Interesting. How do you feel about it? Do you find it fun and interesting, or wish she were more responsible with her money?

column1: 0.0 Mostly I'm a bit frustrated that she's got so much money to blow on these concerts! And to travel all across the country!
column2: 1.0 Yeah, I can understand that. Sometimes when you're not in a position to enjoy yourself because you're busy being tied down with responsibilities, it's easy to get mad at others. Whatever you can do to spin it positively, I would suggest that. Being negative about it will only make everyone's lives worse.
